title: Scientific Thinking Expansion Course Based on Implicit Grammar Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Science Education Program Applying Implicit Learning Principles through Smartphone-Based Microlearning in a Restricted Technology Environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 70% implicit recognition ability of artificial grammar structures after three days of repeated exposure.
Learners achieve over 65% accuracy in solving science problems based on grammar patterns in the final comprehensive evaluation at the end of week 4.
Learners can describe cognitive activity changes during implicit learning processes through self-assessment surveys with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
